edu.OOSE.cs.jhu.group2.PopZombiesModel

Class PopZombieModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.OOSE.cs.jhu.group2.PopZombiesModel.PopZombieModel

  • public class PopZombieModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model for implementing the logic of Pop Zombies. On each level, player tries to eliminate all zombies with popcorn.
    Author:
    Connie Chang, Elaine Chao, Stephanie Chew, Ted Staley, Kevin Zhang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PopZombieModel()
      Constructor for model -- also sets up the level.
